alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cameron County through 115 AM CDT... At 1219 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Padre Island, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Padre Island, Port Isabel City Hall, Port Isabel Lighthouse, Beach Access Four, Washington Park, South Padre Island Police Department, U.s. Coast Guard Station, Port Isabel Fire And Police Department, Beach Access Five and Port Isabel--Laguna Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
